arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in a single folder.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level. This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes various legal documents of Amos and James Denton of the town of Jamaica, Queens County dating from 1757 to 1834. Items include wills, a probate order, deeds, and a sales agreement. There is also one engraving of a young couple entitled "Willing," containing various numerical calculations in the margins and on the verso.
